name: The Monk and the Child
description:
Planned for this Ludum Dare 46 entry was, to have several rooms with different enemies, all set in the theme of buddhistic temples and monasteries with a kind of "Binding of Isaac" level design. Did unfortunately not work out as hoped (lack of time as it is a ludum dare compo game + inexperience with the Unity engine and coding).

Constructive Critic is highly wanted!
